detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit, knee-high football socks in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication at the top and ankle.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft jersey with a low neckline and decorative crossover straps at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs.
Track pants in fast-drying functional fabric made from recycled polyester with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams and cuffed hems.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Knee-length skirt in an airy patterned weave with fringing, buttons at the front and a slit at the back. Lined.
Chisel-toed boots in soft leather with elastic gores down both sides of the shaft. Fabric linings and leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elastication around the top.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a high, elasticated shaft, pointed toes and covered heels. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the front with a wide flounce trim that continues over the shoulders. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front and jetted front pockets with a flap. 3/4-length, gently gathered sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.

Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a sports bra with an elastic hem and space for inserts. Double, elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a low-cut back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Hi-tops in imitation suede with a fold-down edge and tongue covered in faux fur. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the top and elasticated lacing at the front. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Sleeveless nightdress in soft organic cotton jersey with a lined top and wrapover front for easier nursing access. Elasticated seam under the bust and a lace-trimmed hem.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Suede slingbacks with pointed toes, covered heels and a heel strap with covered elastication. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Short jersey dress with narrow shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt.
Short skirt in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and gently rounded hem.
Short, high-waisted skirt in woven fabric containing glittery threads. Double-layered waistband, a concealed zip and button in one side, and tiers to the hem. Unlined.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in silk jersey.

Push-up bra in ribbed microfibre with lace details and underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Jumper in a soft cable knit with a round neck, low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Stocking-stitched back.
Fitted top in mesh with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves. Lined with a jersey strappy top.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Blouse in an airy, crinkled weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, long, wide puff sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with wide sides and medium coverage at the back.

Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Decorative straps at the front, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, pair of leggings and accessory in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch and a print motif on the front. Leggings with foldover ribbing at the waist.
Blouse in a viscose weave with frills at the front, a small opening and covered button at the back of the neck, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a smocked hem.
Fully lined bikinis. Tops with shoulder straps that have a bow at the front. One of the pairs of bottoms has a flounced trim at the top.
Knee-length football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and a print motif on one leg. Unlined.
Trousers in soft silk with a high, elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs.

Short, wide dress in an airy weave with a V-shaped opening at the top and narrow ties at the neckline. 3/4-length raglan puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs and a seam at the waist and on the skirt. Unlined.
Wide V-neck blouse in a viscose weave with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Flared, calf-length skirt in soft lace made from a cotton blend with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Lined with a short skirt.
Beach dress in sturdy, printed jersey with deep armholes and short sleeves. Draping over the sleeves and down the sides, gathered elastication at the waist, and a rounded hem.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Mesh hi-tops with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, three adjustable hook and loop tabs with a text print at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and linings and rubber soles.
High-waisted, semi-opaque shaping shorts with a sculpting effect on the seat, hips and waist. Longer legs. 80 denier.
Fine-knit hooded jumper in a soft viscose blend with a motif on the front, long sleeves with gathered seams, and a drawstring at the hem.
Short, V-neck dress in jersey crêpe with a tie belt at the waist and short, frilled sleeves with overlocked edges.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Hat in thermal fleece with a contrasting colour trim at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a contrasting colour section and an embroidered text motif on the front. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted, knee-length dress in stretch viscose jersey with long sleeves and a seam at the waist with a decorative knot detail. Unlined.

Playsuit in a soft viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a cut-out section at the back with a sewn-on bow at the top. Wide, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and wide legs.
Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sleeveless top in printed cotton jersey with a frill around the armholes.
Ribbed, off-the-shoulder top in fine-knit stretch fabric with short sleeves.

All-in-one suit in patterned sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined hood, zip down the front, and side pockets. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, a low crotch and wide legs. Jersey ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in washed stretch denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, back pockets and shaping seams at the knees.

Calf-length, sleeveless dress woven in a cotton blend with broderie anglaise, a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti straps. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist, and a gently flared skirt with a scalloped hem. Lined.
Slightly longer top in printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Blank Staples is a streetwear collection of minimalistic pieces that are the perfect canvas for your personal style and creativity. This cosy hoodie is made from heavy, 460 gsm cotton sweatshirt fabric for a premium handfeel. In a straight cut and oversized for a relaxed fit, it has a double-layered, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut jersey T-shirt in a relaxed fit with a round neck.

Coat in a felted wool blend containing some cashmere. Narrow notch lapels with a buttonhole, a chest pocket, flap front pockets, two inner pockets, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Henley shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket and long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour with a print motif and ribbed cuffs.
Medium coverage lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Suede hobo bag with decorative leather straps and a metal ring with a pendant at the front. Magnetic fastener and a length-adjustable handle at the top. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 31x32x18 cm.
Trousers in a stretch linen weave with a regular waist, welt back pockets and tapered legs. Cotton jersey waist panel for best fit.
Short T-shirt dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cotton twill jacket with embroidery, a collar and buttons down the front. Fake chest pockets with a flap and button, and buttoned cuffs.
Short vest top in a crinkled viscose weave with a lace detail. V-neck with a wrapover front and an elasticated hem.

Padded parka with a pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Handwarmer pockets and flap front pockets with a press-stud, tab with adjustable fastening and inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Bikini briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Short, A-line skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a high waist and buttons down the front. Jersey lining.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 3 cm.
Glasses case in imitation leather with an imitation suede lining. Flap with a reinforced front and press-stud fastening. Size 6x16 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and flared hems.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs. Diameter from 1.5 cm to 2 cm.
Trousers in a lightweight weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight legs. Jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum fit.
Short top in woven fabric with a round neckline, short, elasticated sleeves with an opening and ties, and smocking with a small frill trim at the hem.
Hat in a soft jacquard knit with a pompom on the top and a ribbed hem.
Kids Exclusive. Bib-front dress knitted in soft, organic cotton with flounce-trimmed, adjustable straps that cross at the back and a flared skirt.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood, front pockets and a tie belt at the waist.
Earmuffs in faux fur and velour with a plastic headband covered in imitation leather. Polyester filling.
Thin tights with a glittery pattern and an elasticated waist.
Short top in an airy weave with a sheen. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide flounce at the top.
Short-sleeved jersey nightdress with a print motif on the front.
